person.persName: James R. Hardin (Henry County, Kentucky, farmer.)

body.p: Henry County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Farmer in Henry County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Henry County in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in Henry County in 1860.
